name: BakePlatesWithBoxMap
description: Bakes Plate objects with a BoxMapping (by default the material is applied 'by layer' and has to be defined in the layer the objects are baked to).

inputParameters.name: MapSize
inputParameters.description: Scaling of the BoxMap in x,y,z directions (list of three positive values) (optional).

inputParameters.name: LayerName
inputParameters.description: Name of the Layer to bake Plates on (optional).

inputParameters.name: Bake
inputParameters.description: Set to True to Bake. Nothing happens if None or False.
